db.juhaku.juhakudb.util

Class ReflectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.juhaku.juhakudb.util.ReflectionUtils

  • public class ReflectionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by juha on 06/04/16.

    This class provides utilities for making reflection easier.

    Since:
    1.0.2

    • Method Detail

      • findField

        public static java.lang.reflect.Field findField(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                java.lang.String name)
        Method looks for specific Field from given clazz all the way up to the Object class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class whose field is looked for.
        name - String name of the field to look for.
        Returns:
        found Field otherwise null.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • findIdField

        public static java.lang.reflect.Field findIdField(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Method searches field with annotation Id through declared fields of given class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - instance of entity class to look for id field.
        Returns:
        Field if found; otherwise null.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • getGenericFieldType

        public static final <T> java.lang.Class<?> getGenericFieldType(T type)
        Returns field type of generic fields of given class. e.g. for List<Type> the Type is returned.
        Parameters:
        type - instance of Field.
        Returns:
        Class representing generic type of given field. If field does not have generic type null will be returned.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • getFieldType

        public static final <T> java.lang.Class<?> getFieldType(T type)
        Returns field type for given Field. If field is generic then generic type will be returned if field type is object then the object will be returned.
        Parameters:
        type - instance of Field.
        Returns:
        Class representing type of the field.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • getClassGenericTypes

        public static final <T> java.lang.Class[] getClassGenericTypes(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Get generic types of class. If class is not generic sub class of generic super class exception will occur.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Generic sub class of generic super class.
        Returns:
        Class array instance of generic types of super class.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • getInterfaceGenericTypes

        public static final <T> java.lang.Class[] getInterfaceGenericTypes(java.lang.Class<T> interf)
        Gets array of all generic types from all super interfaces for the given interface class.
        Parameters:
        interf - Class of which super interface's generic types will be returned.
        Returns:
        Class array containing all the generic types from super interfaces.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • getClassGenericTypes

        public static final <T> java.lang.Class[] getClassGenericTypes(TypedClass<T> typedClass)
        Get generic type classes with by providing instance of TypedClass. This can be used to query generic type without class being subclass of generic super class. See more details TypedClass
        Parameters:
        typedClass - Typed class that provides sub classing for type that need to be returned.
        Returns:
        Class array representing types of typed class.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • getFieldValue

        public static final <T> T getFieldValue(java.lang.Object type,
                                        java.lang.reflect.Field field)
        Get value of field from given object.
        Parameters:
        type - Object to query field value from.
        field - Field to query value from.
        Returns:
        Value of given field in given object or null if exception occurs.
        Since:
        1.0.2

      • getFieldValue

        public static final <T> T getFieldValue(java.lang.String name,
                                        java.lang.Object o)
        Get field's value by searching field by given name.
        Parameters:
        name - String name of the field whose value should be returned.
        o - Object to look for field's value from.
        Returns:
        Value of the field or null if field is not found.
        Since:
        1.2.0

      • getIdFieldValue

        public static final <T> T getIdFieldValue(java.lang.Object o)
        Helper method to retrieve id field's value from given object. Given object must be a database entity with annotation javax.persistence.Entity and it must have id field annotated with Id. If requirements are missing null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        o - Object instance of database entity to get id field's value from.
        Returns:
        Value of id field.
        Since:
        1.2.0

      • setFieldValue

        public static final <T> void setFieldValue(java.lang.String name,
                                           java.lang.Object o,
                                           T value)
        Search field from given object by the provided name and set the given value to that object. Any error that occurs during execution will be logged.
        Parameters:
        name - String name of the field to look for.
        o - Object whose field will be modified with given value.
        value - T type object that will be placed to the field of given object.
        Since:
        1.2.0

      • setFieldValue

        public static final <T> void setFieldValue(java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                                           java.lang.Object o,
                                           T value)
        Sets given value to the provided Field. Field must be field of given object. Any error that occurs during execution will be logged.
        Parameters:
        field - Field of object that will be modified.
        o - Object whose field will be modified with given value.
        value - T type object that will be placed to the field of given object.
        Since:
        1.2.0

      • instantiateConstructor

        public static final <T> T instantiateConstructor(java.lang.reflect.Constructor constructor,
                                                 java.lang.Object... args)
        Instantiate class via given constructor with given arguments.
        Parameters:
        constructor - Constructor to instantiate.
        args - Object array or arguments to pass to the constructor.
        Returns:
        Instantiated constructor or null if error occurs during instantiation.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • instantiateConstructor

        public static final <T> T instantiateConstructor(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                 java.lang.Object... args)
        Instantiate given class with given objects by looking for most suitable constructor. If constructor cannot be found null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to instantiate by constructor that suits for given arguments.
        args - Object array or arguments to pass to the constructor.
        Returns:
        Instantiated class or null if error occurs during instantiation.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • findConstructorByParams

        public static final <T> T findConstructorByParams(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                  java.lang.Object... args)
        Find constructor from given class that has given args as parameter.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to to look for constructors from.
        args - Object array or arguments to pass to the constructor.
        Returns:
        Found Constructor or null if no constructor with args was found.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • instantiateByDefaultConstructor

        public static final <T> T instantiateByDefaultConstructor(java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Initialize new instance of class. Class must have default constructor available.
        Parameters:
        type - Class to instantiate.
        Returns:
        Newly created instance of provided class or null if default constructor is not found.
        Since:
        2.0.1-SNAPSHOT

      • countDeclaredFields

        public static final int countDeclaredFields(java.lang.Class<?> type,
                                            boolean ignoreTransient)
        Get's count of declared fields in in given class.
        Parameters:
        type - Instance of Class type of object which declared fields will be counted.
        ignoreTransient - Boolean value to indicate whether to ignore fields that are not stored in database.
        Returns:
        count of declared fields or 0 if class does not have declared fields.
        Since:
        2.0.1-SNAPSHOT
